p: Different concentrations of galantamine and REVERC3 were further tested for the inhibition of BuChE enzyme and the kinetic parameters determined. Galantamine was found to inhibit the enzyme activity competitively ( Figure 4a), whereas REVERC3 exhibited uncompetitive inhibition ( Figure 4b). REVERC3 had reduced V max (0.04) and K m (139 µM) values compared to the enzyme activity without inhibitor (V max 0.08, K m 289.4 µM).
